about_the_game:
DLC downloads to your game folder.

7 HD and Hi-Resolution Wallpapers contain the following images:
  • The Empress' Shadow (Light)
  • The Empress' Shadow (Dark)
  • The Immortal Empress (Hi-Resolution only)
  • The Catacombs Goddess
  • Tell and Julius (Dark)
  • Tell and Julius (Light)
  • The Tomb
  • Mosaic

Tell a Demon Soundtrack contains the following tracks:
  • Catacombs
  • Facing Our Truths
  • Fog (2015)
  • Forest of Thought
  • Frost Slide (2014)
  • Kialee's Suite
  • Lost Without You
  • Puzzling Rainbow
  • Tell a Demon Theme
  • The Echoing Empty
  • The Haunted Forest
  • The Tomb (2015)
  • Underminded Flame
  • Winds of an Ordeal

Bonus Images (Process Folder)
  • Early Tell a Demon art - from when the game was originally painted in traditional media.
  • Brief Overview of Art Process and Notes

short_description: The soundtrack, some wallpapers, and several bonus images related to the making of Tell a DemonThe Bonus Content contains: 7 HD and hi-resolution wallpapers The Tell a Demon soundtrack (14 mp3 tracks) Several bonus images related to the making of Tell a Demon, including some images from an early version of Tell a Demon when it was execute
